SENT.plain: Multiple cases of posterior helical ear pits (PHEP) with apparent autosomal dominant inheritance in a very large family are reported
There are at least 2 cases of Wiedemann-Beckwith syndrome (WBS) within this family
Three other instances of familial PHEP and/or WBS are presented
An individual with a somewhat atypical osteopetrosis and PHEP is described
The previous literature of PHEP and the association with WBS is reviewed
